2 Inline Listings

Various delimiters: a_word, a_word, a_word, a_word and even a_word done.

Indirectly: a_word; and with messed up braces foo { bar.

And also as an environment: a_word; done.

␣␣␣␣end;

8 Listing with Math

⬇
1//calculate aij
2a[i][j] = a[j][j]/a[i][j];
⬇
1//calculate aij
2a[i][j] = a[j][j]/a[i][j];
⬇
1// calculate aij
2aij=ajj/aij;
3// calculate aij=sinx
4a[i,j]=sin(x)
5foo=”a␣word”;
6foo=”a␣x2␣math”;
⬇
1// calculate <aij>
2a_{ij}
3 = a_{jj}/a{ij};
⬇
1// calculate $a_{ij}$
2$a_{ij}
3 = a_{jj}/a{ij}$;
4// calculate $a_{ij} =
5\sin x$
6a[i,j]=sin(x)
7foo="a␣word";
8foo="a␣\"string";
9foo="a␣$x^2$␣math";
